descriptionHTML:
FREE VERSION OF Math Watch Face AVAILABLE IN GOOGLE PLAY

Watch face for android wear based smart watches.
It displays current hour as math expression so it trains your brain every time you check the time.
The Math Watch supports 12h(am/pm) and 24h time format.
It also displays day of a week - date and battery level is available in FULL VERSION

The expression changes every minute when you are not looking at your watch and every 15 seconds when you use it.

Its kind of math game, and great training!
Train your brain every day!

Solving mathematical problems many times a day improves your math skills and forces your brain to work.
Try it and you will see how fast your brain can learn quick math calculations. After few days it will be no problem for you to calculate the current hour.


We will be also very grateful if you could give us some feedback and let us know about any feature you would like us to add or improve.

Or you can just tell us what do you think about it. Maybe time checking with our app is to easy for you and you want us to add some multiplications or divisions :).

makeitsmart.developer@gmail.com

Best regards and big thanks for any purchase.
recentChanges: our app was not visible in android wear app
